items.sentence: I stopped laughing as soon as I noticed that Tom was crying.
I suggest you talk to Tom about how to handle the situation.
Tom said he didn\'t have time to answer all of my questions.
Mary promised her mother that she would help her more often.
I wish Tom wouldn\'t keep telling everyone I\'m his brother.
I won\'t go to tonight\'s party if Tom is going to be there.
Many parents think there\'s too much violence on television.
Nobody knows what it is that has been bothering him so much.
Seen from a distance, the big rock looks like an old castle.
Mary was offended when Tom bought her some breath freshener.
